name: array-source
description: Read arrays as standard WhatWG streams.

scripts.prepublish: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && rollup --banner "$(preamble)" -f umd -n sources.array -o dist/array-source.js -- index.js && uglifyjs --preamble "$(preamble)" -o dist/array-source.min.js -cm -- dist/array-source.js
